H0.text: Resistors are metals that easily transfer electricity.

H1.text: Magnets are metals that easily transfer electricity.

H2.text: Insulators are metals that easily transfer electricity.

H3.text: Conductors are metals that easily transfer electricity.

A4.text: Insulators are non-conducting materials with few mobile charges that support only insignificant electric currents.

A5.text: Conduction materials include metals, electrolytes, superconductors, semiconductors, plasmas and some nonmetallic conductors such as graphite and conductive polymers.
